title: Electricity (Common Carrier) (Declaration) (Revocation) Order, 2021
content:
31st December, 2021 Statutory Instruments 743
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 94 OF 2021
The Electricity Act, 2019
(Act No. 11 of 2019)
The Electricity (Common Carrier) (Declaration)
(Revocation) Order, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 15 of the Electricity
Act, 2019, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity (Common Carrier) Title
(Declaration) (Revocation) Order, 2021.
2. The Electricity (Common Carrier) (Declaration) Regulations, Revocation
2021, are revoked. of S.I.
No. 24 of
2021
P. C. KAPALA,
LUSAKA Minister of Energy
29th December, 2021
[MOE /DOE/64 /1 /1]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
744 Statutory Instruments 31st December, 2021
